NSec Remote Signer Configurator

This configurator requires Google Chrome, a Chromium browser or Microsoft Edge on desktop Windows, macOS, or Linux for Web Serial support.

Welcome to the NSec Remote Signer configuration tool. This tool helps you set up your NSec Remote Signer device with WiFi credentials, relay information, and your Nostr keys.

Buy a NSec Remote Signer GitHub Repository

To configure your device:

  1. 1. Press and hold Button 1 while connecting your device
  2. 2. Wait for the "Setup mode" screen to appear
  3. 3. Click the connect button below
